sen.j: 京菓子（きょうがし）は、京都府のお菓子。
sen.e: Kyo-gashi means sweets made in Kyoto prefecture.
sen.cmt: 京菓子が発展した地域と現在の京都府の地域は必ずしも重ならないので、「京都府のお菓子」という文はおかしいと思うのですが、ひとまず原文のまま訳しました。
sen.e: Kyo-gashi means sweets that are made in Kyoto prefecture.
Kyo-gashi means sweets that are made in Kyoto prefecture.

sen.j: 現在は「工芸菓子」や「細工菓子」とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: Nowadays they are also known as "sweets of craft" or "sweets of art".
Nowadays they are also known as "sweets of craft" or "sweets of art."
Nowadays they are also known as "sweets of craft" or "sweets of art."
